DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine jump land mechanic young female athlete improve resistance training intervention .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Resistance Training Jump Landing Mechanics Young Female Athletes
DOC.detailed_description: After initial baseline testing , athletes randomly select receive upper body ( control group ) low body ( intervention group ) resistance training . Athletes attend supervised training session twice per week 12 week , re-tested .
DOC.criteria: least one year experience play organize sport previous experience resistance training injury pain level 3/10 VAS health condition would preclude complete train test previous experience use Biodex dynamometer
